markdownRemark.html:
This data-driven journalism project was developed in 2011 with a team led by the journalist John Dinges. My role was Data Editor, UX design and software programming.

A renewed version (with a new software but the same dataset) can be seen here

frontmatter.title: Interactive map of the mass executions of 1973 (Archivos Chile)
